headline: Is Synopsys Still Attractively Priced After Recent AI Enthusiasm and Share Price Rebound?
summary: Wondering if Synopsys at around $475 a share is still a smart buy or if most of the upside is already priced in? You are not alone. This is exactly the question we will unpack here. The stock has bounced about 5.0% in the last week and 17.6% over the past month, even though it is still roughly flat this year at -1.5% and down about 4.9% over the last 12 months, while longer term holders are sitting on gains of 50.9% over three years and 85.2% over five. Some of this recent strength reflects...

headline: Synopsys (SNPS): Has the Recent 18% Share Price Rebound Left the Stock Undervalued?
summary: Synopsys (SNPS) has quietly climbed about 18% over the past month, even as its one year return is slightly negative. That mix of short term strength and longer term lag is catching investor attention. See our latest analysis for Synopsys. That recent 17.6% one month share price return comes after a softer year to date share price performance and a slightly negative one year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is starting to rebuild as investors refocus on Synopsys' structural...
